[00:00.00]7 rings (Explicit) - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:03.42]Lyrics by：Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx/Ariana Grande/Njomza Vitia/Richard Rogers/Oscar Hammerstein II/Kimberly Krysiuk/Tommy Brown/Michael Foster/Charles Anderson
[00:06.84]Composed by：Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx/Ariana Grande/Njomza Vitia/Richard Rogers/Oscar Hammerstein II/Kimberly Krysiuk/Tommy Brown/Michael Foster/Charles Anderson
[00:10.26]Produced by：Tommy Brown/Charles Anderson/Michael Foster
[00:13.69]Yeah breakfast at Tiffany's and bottles of bubbles
[00:17.51]Girls with tattoos who like getting in trouble
[00:20.88]Lashes and diamonds ATM machines
[00:24.43]Buy myself all of my favorite things
[00:27.38]Yeah
[00:27.78]Been through some bad s**t I should be a sad b***h
[00:31.29]Who woulda thought it'd turn me to a savage
[00:34.57]Rather be tied up with calls and not strings
[00:38.14]Write my own checks like I write what I sing yeah
[00:41.28]Yeah
[00:41.47]My wrist stop watchin' my neck is flossy
[00:44.71]Make big deposits my gloss is poppin'
[00:48.10]You like my hair
[00:49.79]Gee thanks just bought it
[00:51.54]I see it I like it I want it I got it
[00:54.80]Yeah
[00:55.03]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[00:58.33]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[01:01.73]You like my hair
[01:03.53]Gee thanks just bought it
[01:05.22]I see it I like it I want it I got it
[01:08.60]Yeah
[01:08.88]Wearing a ring but ain't gon' be no "Mrs."
[01:12.37]Bought matching diamonds for six of my b***hes
[01:15.77]I'd rather spoil all my friends with my riches
[01:19.17]Think retail therapy my new addiction
[01:22.68]Whoever said money can't solve your problems
[01:26.10]Must not have had enough money to solve 'em
[01:29.51]They say "Which one" I say "Nah I want all of 'em"
[01:32.94]Happiness is the same price as red-bottoms
[01:36.06]My smile is beamin' my skin is gleamin'
[01:39.41]The way it shine I know you've seen it
[01:42.52]You've seen it
[01:43.22]I bought a crib just for the closet
[01:46.37]Both his and hers I want it I got it yeah
[01:49.98]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[01:53.16]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[01:56.73]Baby
[01:56.93]You like my hair
[01:58.44]Gee thanks just bought it
[01:59.77]Oh yeah
[02:00.04]I see it I like it I want it I got it
[02:03.09]Yeah
[02:03.27]Yeah my receipts be lookin' like phone numbers
[02:05.48]If it ain't money then wrong number
[02:07.16]Black card is my business card
[02:08.81]The way it be settin' the tone for me
[02:10.63]I don't mean to brag but I be like "Put it in the bag" yeah
[02:14.03]When you see them racks they stacked up like my a*s yeah
[02:17.49]Shoot go from the store to the booth
[02:19.16]Make it all back in one loop give me the loot
[02:21.40]Never mind I got the juice
[02:22.69]Nothing but net when we shoot
[02:23.88]Look at my neck look at my jet
[02:25.57]Ain't got enough money to pay me respect
[02:27.29]Ain't no budget when I'm on the set
[02:29.06]If I like it then that's what I get yeah
[02:30.89]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[02:33.97]Yeah
[02:34.50]I want it I got it I want it I got it
[02:37.33]Oh yeah yeah
[02:37.96]You like my hair
[02:39.53]Gee thanks just bought it
[02:41.22]I see it I like it I want it I got it
[02:44.58]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:7 rings (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:7 rings (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.42]//
[00:06.84]//
[00:10.26]//
[00:13.69]是啊 整夜狂欢后我疯狂扫货 喝了许多杯香槟
[00:17.51]酷爱纹身的女孩我就爱闯祸啊
[00:20.88]假睫毛 珠宝钻石 有钱到账
[00:24.43]一口气买下我爱的一切
[00:27.38]//
[00:27.78]接连上演的悲剧让我本该无法自拔的沉溺痛苦之中
[00:31.29]谁能料到反而让我蜕变成顽强之人呢？
[00:34.57]宁愿自己被忙碌缠身 也不愿做牵线木偶
[00:38.14]大笔一挥开张支票就如我写歌那般随性
[00:41.28]//
[00:41.47]不必再盯着看了 我的手腕和脖子都戴着亮钻
[00:44.71]大笔美金进账 我真是光彩照人
[00:48.10]你喜欢我的迷人长发？
[00:49.79]喜欢我的发型吗 谢谢 刚买的
[00:51.54]只要我喜欢 我统统都会收入囊中
[00:54.80]//
[00:55.03]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[00:58.33]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[01:01.73]你喜欢我的迷人长发？
[01:03.53]喜欢我的发型吗 谢谢 刚买的
[01:05.22]只要我喜欢 我统统都会收入囊中
[01:08.60]//
[01:08.88]我手戴钻戒可不是说明我已嫁为人妇
[01:12.37]我给我的六位闺蜜们一人买了一枚象征友谊的戒指
[01:15.77]我就是要用这钻戒来表达我对她们的爱
[01:19.17]我觉得这购物疗法已成了我新的习惯
[01:22.68]谁说钱不能解决你的烦恼？
[01:26.10]那是你的钱不够不足以解决你的烦恼吧
[01:29.51]店员们问你想要哪个 我就会说老娘我都要了
[01:32.94]拥有快乐的代价不比拥有那昂贵的红底高跟鞋少
[01:36.06]我的笑容耀发璀璨光芒 我的肌肤宛如新生般晶莹透亮
[01:39.41]我光彩照人 我知道你早就注意到了
[01:42.52]你们早就注意到了
[01:43.22]为了能有个大衣柜 我又买了套豪宅
[01:46.37]无论是谁 只要我想要 我都能拿下
[01:49.98]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[01:53.16]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[01:56.73]宝贝
[01:56.93]你喜欢我的迷人长发？
[01:58.44]喜欢我的发型吗 谢谢 刚买的
[01:59.77]//
[02:00.04]只要我喜欢 我统统都会收入囊中
[02:03.09]//
[02:03.27]账单上的数字长的就像是电话号码
[02:05.48]如果不是钱 那就是打错号码了
[02:07.16]这张黑卡可以说是我的名片
[02:08.81]它间接的说明了我的消费档次
[02:10.63]我可不是夸夸其谈 我只会说全都给我包起来
[02:14.03]当你看到堆积如山的钞票
[02:17.49]开始扫货 每家奢侈品店都不放过
[02:19.16]从头到尾 我要疯狂挥霍
[02:21.40]不用担心 老娘有的是钱
[02:22.69]老娘我可谓是功成名就
[02:23.88]看我的钻石项链 看我的私人飞机
[02:25.57]穷鬼们我可看都不会看一眼
[02:27.29]我的mv拍摄 预算从不设限
[02:29.06]只要我喜欢的 老娘我统统买下
[02:30.89]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[02:33.97]//
[02:34.50]只要我想要 我都能如愿以偿
[02:37.33]//
[02:37.96]你喜欢我的迷人长发？
[02:39.53]喜欢我的发型吗 谢谢 刚买的
[02:41.22]只要我喜欢 我统统都会收入囊中
[02:44.58]//
